duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the testing phase of Workday Payroll implementation, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
Provide expertise in Workday testing and integrate knowledge to guide the testing team towards project success.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand and address testing requirements for the Payroll implementation.
Apply knowledge of Workday integration to support and optimize the testing process.
Document and report on testing results and provide recommendations for improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
